author: cgreenwood
title: EastEnders spoilers: Louise Mitchell furious as Bex Fowler grows closer to Travis Law-Hughes
text:
EastEnders spoilers: Louise Mitchell furious as Bex Fowler grows closer to Travis Law-Hughes 
Bex Fowler is about to learn that hell hath no fury like a Mitchell scorned Spoiler Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Comments LOUISE Mitchell claims to feel remorse for leaking Shakil Kazemi’s naked pictures in EastEnders but her true colours are set to emerge when she scuppers his reunion with Bex Fowler. 
The Mitchell daughter – who is played by actress Tilly Keeper – caused Shakil’s life to become a living hell when she sent his naked pictures around the school and let his ex Bex take the blame. BBC 3 Louise confronts Bex over the rumours but is it a revenge ploy for Bex? 
But now she’s set to turn on her friend when she thinks she’s become romantically involved with her love interest Travis Law-Hughes. 
Shakil and Bex look set to get back together on Valentine’s Day when he sends her a card, but when he turns up to her house for a chat, he’s shocked to find Travis there. 
With Bex looking delighted, Travis skulks in a corner looking sheepish, but what have they been doing? 
Having listened to the scheming Mean Girls Madison and Alexandra who seem determined to get Louise to destroy her best friend, Louise falls for it. BBC 3 Louise takes what the Mean Girls tell her as gospel 
Furiously confronting Bex, an angry Louise won’t listen to reason, but is there something behind the rumours and is Bex really interested in Travis? 
Or is this revenge for Louise’s shocking betrayal that saw Bex’s ex Shakil humiliated and beaten in school? BBC Bex will be growing closer to Travis but is it all it seems and will it stop her reunion with Shakil? As his private pictures went viral in the school, he got into a fight and was brutally beaten down before being placed in isolation for his troubles . 
With Shakil's school life now in hell, will he confess all to his mother and will Louise, or indeed Bex, be prosecuted for the betrayal? EastEnders airs Monday, Tuesday, Thursday and Friday nights on BBC One
